amendment.description: To provide for judicial review of detention of enemy combatants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2523 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 324.

action.text: Amendment SA 2523 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 2515. (consideration: CR S12727-12739; text: CR S12727) To provide for judicial review of detention of enemy combatants.
